c74object.name: poly.ambipan~
c74object.description: The poly.ambipan~ object spatializes multiple inputs in a plan due to the ambisonic B format by Michael Gerzon. The gains of every loudspeaker help creating a virtual location of the sound sources all around the listener.

metadatalist.metadata: E.PARIS, R.MIGNOT, B.COURRIBET, CICM, Paris-8 University, MSH Paris Nord, ACI Jeunes.

objarg.name: number-of-inputs
objarg.digest: The Number of inputs, and so of source.
objarg.description: The argument specify the number of input channels you need, and so of sources, it must be between 2 and 32. Without parameters there is only one.

objarg.name: number-of-outputs
objarg.digest: The Number of outlets, and so of loudspeakers by default.
objarg.description: The argument specify the number of output channels you need, and so of loudspeakers by default, it must be between 2 and 32. Without parameters there are 4 outlets.

objarg.name: coordinate-type
objarg.description: Coordinate type : 'c' = cartesian, 'p' = polar, by default the coordinates are cartesian.

objarg.name: ambisonic-offset
objarg.description: Set the Ambisonic offset. By default 0.3.

method.name: set_nb_hp
method.description: The word set_nb_hp, followed by an int change the loudspeaker number. the number must be between 2 and the number of current outputs.

method.name: get_info
method.digest: Print informations into the Max window.

method.name: change_type
method.description: In order to change the coordinates type: 'c'= cartesian, 'p' = polar.
